35 import rospy
36 from rosgraph.names import ns_join
37 from . import conversions
38 
39 from moveit_msgs.msg import PlanningScene, CollisionObject, AttachedCollisionObject
40 from moveit_ros_planning_interface import _moveit_planning_scene_interface
41 from geometry_msgs.msg import Pose, Point
42 from shape_msgs.msg import SolidPrimitive, Plane, Mesh, MeshTriangle
43 from .exception import MoveItCommanderException
44 from moveit_msgs.srv import ApplyPlanningScene, ApplyPlanningSceneRequest
45 
46 try:
47  from pyassimp import pyassimp
48 except:
49  # support pyassimp > 3.0
50  try:
51  import pyassimp
52  except:
53  pyassimp = False
54  print(
55  "Failed to import pyassimp, see https://github.com/ros-planning/moveit/issues/86 for more info"
56  )
57 
58 
59 class PlanningSceneInterface(object):
60  """
61  Python interface for a C++ PlanningSceneInterface.
62  Uses both C++ wrapped methods and scene manipulation topics
63  to manipulate the PlanningScene managed by the PlanningSceneMonitor.
64  See wrap_python_planning_scene_interface.cpp for the wrapped methods.
65  """
66 
67  def __init__(self, ns="", synchronous=False, service_timeout=5.0):
68  self._psi = _moveit_planning_scene_interface.PlanningSceneInterface(ns)
69 
70  self._pub_co = rospy.Publisher(
71  ns_join(ns, "collision_object"), CollisionObject, queue_size=100
72  )
73  self._pub_aco = rospy.Publisher(
74  ns_join(ns, "attached_collision_object"),
75  AttachedCollisionObject,
76  queue_size=100,
77  )
78  self.__synchronous = synchronous
79  if self.__synchronous:
80  self._apply_planning_scene_diff = rospy.ServiceProxy(
81  ns_join(ns, "apply_planning_scene"), ApplyPlanningScene
82  )
83  self._apply_planning_scene_diff.wait_for_service(service_timeout)
84 
85  def __submit(self, collision_object, attach=False):
86  if self.__synchronous:
87  diff_req = self.__make_planning_scene_diff_req(collision_object, attach)
88  self._apply_planning_scene_diff.call(diff_req)
89  else:
90  if attach:
91  self._pub_aco.publish(collision_object)
92  else:
93  self._pub_co.publish(collision_object)
94 
95  def add_object(self, collision_object):
96  """ Add an object to the planning scene """
97  self.__submit(collision_object, attach=False)
98 
99  def add_sphere(self, name, pose, radius=1):
100  """ Add a sphere to the planning scene """
101  co = self.__make_sphere(name, pose, radius)
102  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
103 
104  def add_cylinder(self, name, pose, height, radius):
105  """ Add a cylinder to the planning scene """
106  co = self.__make_cylinder(name, pose, height, radius)
107  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
108 
109  def add_mesh(self, name, pose, filename, size=(1, 1, 1)):
110  """ Add a mesh to the planning scene """
111  co = self.__make_mesh(name, pose, filename, size)
112  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
113 
114  def add_box(self, name, pose, size=(1, 1, 1)):
115  """ Add a box to the planning scene """
116  co = self.__make_box(name, pose, size)
117  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
118 
119  def add_plane(self, name, pose, normal=(0, 0, 1), offset=0):
120  """ Add a plane to the planning scene """
121  co = CollisionObject()
122  co.operation = CollisionObject.ADD
123  co.id = name
124  co.header = pose.header
125  p = Plane()
126  p.coef = list(normal)
127  p.coef.append(offset)
128  co.planes = [p]
129  co.plane_poses = [pose.pose]
130  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
131 
132  def attach_object(self, attached_collision_object):
133  """ Attach an object in the planning scene """
134  self.__submit(attached_collision_object, attach=True)
135 
136  def attach_mesh(
137  self, link, name, pose=None, filename="", size=(1, 1, 1), touch_links=[]
138  ):
139  aco = AttachedCollisionObject()
140  if (pose is not None) and filename:
141  aco.object = self.__make_mesh(name, pose, filename, size)
142  else:
143  aco.object = self.__make_existing(name)
144  aco.link_name = link
145  aco.touch_links = [link]
146  if len(touch_links) > 0:
147  aco.touch_links = touch_links
148  self.__submit(aco, attach=True)
149 
150  def attach_box(self, link, name, pose=None, size=(1, 1, 1), touch_links=[]):
151  aco = AttachedCollisionObject()
152  if pose is not None:
153  aco.object = self.__make_box(name, pose, size)
154  else:
155  aco.object = self.__make_existing(name)
156  aco.link_name = link
157  if len(touch_links) > 0:
158  aco.touch_links = touch_links
159  else:
160  aco.touch_links = [link]
161  self.__submit(aco, attach=True)
162 
163  def clear(self):
164  """ Remove all objects from the planning scene """
165  self.remove_attached_object()
166  self.remove_world_object()
167 
168  def remove_world_object(self, name=None):
169  """
170  Remove an object from planning scene, or all if no name is provided
171  """
172  co = CollisionObject()
173  co.operation = CollisionObject.REMOVE
174  if name is not None:
175  co.id = name
176  self.__submit(co, attach=False)
177 
178  def remove_attached_object(self, link=None, name=None):
179  """
180  Remove an attached object from the robot, or all objects attached to the link if no name is provided,
181  or all attached objects in the scene if neither link nor name are provided.
182 
183  Removed attached objects remain in the scene as world objects.
184  Call remove_world_object afterwards to remove them from the scene.
185  """
186  aco = AttachedCollisionObject()
187  aco.object.operation = CollisionObject.REMOVE
188  if link is not None:
189  aco.link_name = link
190  if name is not None:
191  aco.object.id = name
192  self.__submit(aco, attach=True)
193 
194  def get_known_object_names(self, with_type=False):
195  """
196  Get the names of all known objects in the world. If with_type is set to true, only return objects that have a known type.
197  """
198  return self._psi.get_known_object_names(with_type)
199 
200  def get_known_object_names_in_roi(
201  self, minx, miny, minz, maxx, maxy, maxz, with_type=False
202  ):
203  """
204  Get the names of known objects in the world that are located within a bounding region (specified in the frame reported by
205  get_planning_frame()). If with_type is set to true, only return objects that have a known type.
206  """
207  return self._psi.get_known_object_names_in_roi(
208  minx, miny, minz, maxx, maxy, maxz, with_type
209  )
210 
211  def get_object_poses(self, object_ids):
212  """
213  Get the poses from the objects identified by the given object ids list.
214  """
215  ser_ops = self._psi.get_object_poses(object_ids)
216  ops = dict()
217  for key in ser_ops:
218  msg = Pose()
219  conversions.msg_from_string(msg, ser_ops[key])
220  ops[key] = msg
221  return ops
222 
223  def get_objects(self, object_ids=[]):
224  """
225  Get the objects identified by the given object ids list. If no ids are provided, return all the known objects.
226  """
227  ser_objs = self._psi.get_objects(object_ids)
228  objs = dict()
229  for key in ser_objs:
230  msg = CollisionObject()
231  conversions.msg_from_string(msg, ser_objs[key])
232  objs[key] = msg
233  return objs
234 
235  def get_attached_objects(self, object_ids=[]):
236  """
237  Get the attached objects identified by the given object ids list. If no ids are provided, return all the attached objects.
238  """
239  ser_aobjs = self._psi.get_attached_objects(object_ids)
240  aobjs = dict()
241  for key in ser_aobjs:
242  msg = AttachedCollisionObject()
243  conversions.msg_from_string(msg, ser_aobjs[key])
244  aobjs[key] = msg
245  return aobjs
246 
247  def apply_planning_scene(self, planning_scene_message):
248  """
249  Applies the planning scene message.
250  """
251  return self._psi.apply_planning_scene(
252  conversions.msg_to_string(planning_scene_message)
253  )
254 
255  @staticmethod
256  def __make_existing(name):
257  """
258  Create an empty Collision Object. Used when the object already exists
259  """
260  co = CollisionObject()
261  co.id = name
262  return co
263 
264  @staticmethod
265  def __make_box(name, pose, size):
266  co = CollisionObject()
267  co.operation = CollisionObject.ADD
268  co.id = name
269  co.header = pose.header
270  box = SolidPrimitive()
271  box.type = SolidPrimitive.BOX
272  box.dimensions = list(size)
273  co.primitives = [box]
274  co.primitive_poses = [pose.pose]
275  return co
276 
277  @staticmethod
278  def __make_mesh(name, pose, filename, scale=(1, 1, 1)):
279  co = CollisionObject()
280  if pyassimp is False:
281  raise MoveItCommanderException(
282  "Pyassimp needs patch https://launchpadlibrarian.net/319496602/patchPyassim.txt"
283  )
284  scene = pyassimp.load(filename)
285  if not scene.meshes or len(scene.meshes) == 0:
286  raise MoveItCommanderException("There are no meshes in the file")
287  if len(scene.meshes[0].faces) == 0:
288  raise MoveItCommanderException("There are no faces in the mesh")
289  co.operation = CollisionObject.ADD
290  co.id = name
291  co.header = pose.header
292 
293  mesh = Mesh()
294  first_face = scene.meshes[0].faces[0]
295  if hasattr(first_face, "__len__"):
296  for face in scene.meshes[0].faces:
297  if len(face) == 3:
298  triangle = MeshTriangle()
299  triangle.vertex_indices = [face[0], face[1], face[2]]
300  mesh.triangles.append(triangle)
301  elif hasattr(first_face, "indices"):
302  for face in scene.meshes[0].faces:
303  if len(face.indices) == 3:
304  triangle = MeshTriangle()
305  triangle.vertex_indices = [
306  face.indices[0],
307  face.indices[1],
308  face.indices[2],
309  ]
310  mesh.triangles.append(triangle)
311  else:
312  raise MoveItCommanderException(
313  "Unable to build triangles from mesh due to mesh object structure"
314  )
315  for vertex in scene.meshes[0].vertices:
316  point = Point()
317  point.x = vertex[0] * scale[0]
318  point.y = vertex[1] * scale[1]
319  point.z = vertex[2] * scale[2]
320  mesh.vertices.append(point)
321  co.meshes = [mesh]
322  co.mesh_poses = [pose.pose]
323  pyassimp.release(scene)
324  return co
325 
326  @staticmethod
327  def __make_sphere(name, pose, radius):
328  co = CollisionObject()
329  co.operation = CollisionObject.ADD
330  co.id = name
331  co.header = pose.header
332  sphere = SolidPrimitive()
333  sphere.type = SolidPrimitive.SPHERE
334  sphere.dimensions = [radius]
335  co.primitives = [sphere]
336  co.primitive_poses = [pose.pose]
337  return co
338 
339  @staticmethod
340  def __make_cylinder(name, pose, height, radius):
341  co = CollisionObject()
342  co.operation = CollisionObject.ADD
343  co.id = name
344  co.header = pose.header
345  cylinder = SolidPrimitive()
346  cylinder.type = SolidPrimitive.CYLINDER
347  cylinder.dimensions = [height, radius]
348  co.primitives = [cylinder]
349  co.primitive_poses = [pose.pose]
350  return co
351 
352  @staticmethod
353  def __make_planning_scene_diff_req(collision_object, attach=False):
354  scene = PlanningScene()
355  scene.is_diff = True
356  scene.robot_state.is_diff = True
357  if attach:
358  scene.robot_state.attached_collision_objects = [collision_object]
359  else:
360  scene.world.collision_objects = [collision_object]
361  planning_scene_diff_req = ApplyPlanningSceneRequest()
362  planning_scene_diff_req.scene = scene
363  return planning_scene_diff_req
